text:
Justice (R) Mir Hazar Khan Khoso (Urdu,) (born 30 September 1929), was the caretaker Prime Minister of Pakistan, from 25 March 2013 to 5 June 2013.
Khoso is a retired judge. He was the Chief Justice of the Federal Shariat Court. He was the interim Prime Minister ahead of the general elections scheduled in May 2013.
